Title: Asymmetrical One Shoulder Evening Dress with Beaded Design

Featured-image: C222-red-gold-asymmetrical-one-shoulder-evening-dress-with-beaded-design_p.jpg

Description: A one shouldered look with two toned fabric. The shoulder, bodice, and one side of the skirt are sequined with rhinestones and makes a swirling pattern. The other side of the gown is a stunning chiffon and has a split in the side.
